title: [FEATURE] Metal support for tvOS
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

Currently, Metal seems to be only supported on iOS and macOS. This appears to just be because the code was pretty much just written like that and no actual technical limitation.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Adding the APIs from this issue https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/1391 and this PR https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1394, but for tvOS.
Since some changes are needed to native skia, I opened this: https://bugs.chromium.org/p/skia/issues/detail?id=11250

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

There are no other alternatives :)

**Additional context**

I gave it a quick stab, but it seems to be a few more lines of if's and else's and ios -> tvos things. Looks to be names-only as the feature set is pretty close.
